alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 01 at 7:25PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tishomingo, northeastern Prentiss and southeastern Alcorn Counties through 745 PM CST... At 725 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hinkle, or 7 miles northeast of Booneville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Booneville, Burnsville, Glen, Thrashers, Hinkle, Midway, Leedy, Rienzi, Doskie, Biggersville, Jobes, Hazard Switch, Walker Siding, Holcut and Holts Spur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi.
